entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud except cloudy near the Richardson mountains with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Monday 3 April 2023
